text: Þis sind þa landgemæro to stanmere.
Ærst of þan crundelun þær to stræte &lang stræte to Aþulfes þorne þonnon on fyrd hammas anlang stifig weges þonne on cat beorh þonne on Ælfheages gemære.
Þonon &lang mære weges on wulforan þonon andlang gemæres to ines dene ufewearde þæt þonon on stiele þonne &lang gemæres þæt on lic hangan.
Of lic hangan on pocging rode þonnon on dunan wyrþe.

Þonon on loceres weg andlang weges on þa ealdan stigele of þære stigele þwers ofer rammes hryeg þonnon on þone ealdan hyrne weg þannon on beden weg of beden weg suþewearde innan &lang hecgan onbutan hunes dune þæt eft on þa crundelas be suþan haran grafas.
